item.title: The page got a new design - now it also fits for your smartphone. Try it! ;-)
item.description: The new, responsible page design comes along with a couple of internal and technical changes like usage of a database or templating via mustachJS....but that are details! Most important for you: it now scales regarding to the screen size of your device.
